# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    result = ""
    current_line_length = 0
    for word in words
        if current_line_length + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            current_line_length = 0
        end
        result *= word * " "
        current_line_length += length(word) + 1
    end
    return result
end

# Example
text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text, text_width=15)
println(wrapped_text)
```

Output:
```
Lorem ipsum 
dolor sit amet, 
consectetur 
adipiscing 
elit. 
```
